description.description: Short description of the Camera App.

beautyEffect.description: Beauty effect's name. Smooths skin and increases brightness.

grayscaleEffect.description: Grayscale effect's name. Makes the images in grayscale.

newspaperEffect.description: Newspaper effect's name. Makes the image look like in a newspaper.

normalEffect.description: Name of the normal effect, which means that no effect will be applied.

sepiaEffect.description: Sepia effect's name. Makes the image look like an old picture.

retro30Effect.description: Retro '30 effect's name. Makes the image look like a retro picture.

retro50Effect.description: Retro '50 effect's name. Makes the image look like a retro picture.

retro60Effect.description: Retro '60 effect's name. Makes the image look like a retro picture.

photoLabEffect.description: Photo Lab effect's name. Makes the image look like developed in a home photo laboratory.

modernEffect.description: Modern effect's name. Colorizes parts of the image with different colors.

swirlEffect.description: Swirl effect's name. Makes the image look like a whirlpool.

cinemaEffect.description: Cinema effect's name. Makes the image look like from a movie.

vintageEffect.description: Vintage effect's name. Makes the image look vintage.

ghostEffect.description: Ghost effect's name. Duplicates face when moving.

errorMsgNoCamera.description: Error message shown when it was impossible to connect to the camera due to unavailability.

errorMsgNoCameraHint.message: יש לבדוק אם המצלמה מחוברת כראוי.
errorMsgNoCameraHint.description: Hint message shown below the main error message. A hint for a user why the error occured.

errorMsgGalleryLoadFailed.description: Error message shown when loading the gallery failed.

errorMsgGallerySaveFailed.description: Error message shown when saving and adding a image or video to the gallery failed.

errorMsgGalleryExportFailed.description: Error message shown when saving to an external directory failed. Expects a file name to be passed in.

errorMsgToggleRecordOnFailed.description: Error message shown when switching to record video mode failed.

errorMsgEmptyRecording.description: Error message shown when no data is recorded for a recording and it won't be added to the gallery.

errorMsgNoWebGL.message: שיפור מהירות באמצעות חומרה אינו זמין.
errorMsgNoWebGL.description: Error message shown when WebGL is not available.

errorMsgNoWebGLHint.message: ייתכן שכרטיס המסך במחשב שלך אינו מתאים, או שמנהלי ההתקן ישנים.
errorMsgNoWebGLHint.description: Hint shown below the main error message, when WebGL is not detected.

filtersButton.description: Label for the toggle filters button.

maximizeButton.description: Text to speech Label for the maximize button.

closeButton.description: Text to speech label for the close button.

galleryImages.description: Text to speech label for the gallery list.

takePictureButton.description: Label for the red picture taking button.

recordVideoStartButton.description: Label for the red video recording button to start recording.

recordVideoStopButton.description: Label for the red video recording button to stop recording.

toggleTimerButton.description: Label for the button to toggle the countdown timer.

toggleMultiButton.description: Label for the button to toggle the multi-shot feature.

toggleCameraButton.description: Label for the button to switch between multiple cameras. Eg. switching from front facing to back facing, or a camera connected via USB. The button is shown only when more than one camera is connected.

toggleRecordOnButton.description: Label for the button to switch to record video mode.

toggleRecordOffButton.description: Label for the button to switch to take picture mode.

recordVideoActiveMessage.description: Message shown when activating the video recording feature.

takePictureActiveMessage.description: Message shown when activating the photo taking feature.

toggleMirrorButton.description: Label for the button to toggle the preview mirroring.

toggleTimerActiveMessage.description: Message shown when activating the timer.

toggleTimerInactiveMessage.description: Message shown when inactivating the timer.

toggleMultiActiveMessage.description: Message shown when activating the multi-shot feature.

toggleMultiInactiveMessage.description: Message shown when inactivating the multi-shot feature.

toggleMirrorActiveMessage.description: Message shown when activating the preview mirroring.

toggleMirrorInactiveMessage.description: Message shown when inactivating the preview mirroring.

dialogYesButton.description: Label for the accepting button in the confirmation dialog.

dialogNoButton.description: Label for the dismissing button in the confirmation dialog.

dialogOKButton.description: Label for the OK button in the alert dialog.

deleteConfirmationMsg.description: Confirmation message before removing a selected item from the gallery. Expects a file name to be passed in.

deleteMultiConfirmationMsg.description: Confirmation message before removing multiple selected items from the gallery. Expects a file count to be passed in.
